Description:
Model
Brand: Fractal Design
Series: Focus 2
Model: FD-C-FOC2A-03


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: Steel / Tempered Glass
With Power Supply: No
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: Micro ATX / ATX / Mini-ITX / Mini-DTX
Side Panel Window: Yes
LED: ARGB
Dust Filters: Top (plastic mesh)
PSU (nylon)
Front (steel mesh)


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 2 (included)
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 2 included, 6 total
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x USB 3.0 / Audio / RGB controller


Cooling System
Fan Options: Front: 3 x 120mm / 2 x 140mm fan (2 x Aspect 14 RGB fans included)

Top: 2 x 120mm / 2 x 140mm fan

Rear: 1 x 120mm fan
Radiator Options: Front: 360mm / 280mm

Top: 240mm (max 46mm MB component height)

Rear: 120mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 405 mm with front fan mounted
Max CPU Cooler Height: 170 mm
Max PSU Length: 250 mm (175 mm recommended)
Dimensions (H x W x D): 17.74" x 8.46" x 18.56"
17.20" x 8.46" x 18.07" w/o feet/protrusions/screws
Weight: 14.11 lbs.


Additional Info
Features: Accommodates ATX / mATX / Mini ITX Motherboards

Easily mounted tempered glass side panel lets you showcase your components

Comes with two 140 mm Aspect RGB fans and six total fan positions

The easy-to-clean front mesh acts as a dust filter while allowing high airflow

Innovative shroud system for optimal GPU airflow and easy building

Front I/O features two 3.0 USB 5 Gb/s ports, Mic and headphone jacks, and newly developed addressable RGB controller with RGB power LED

Optional USB-C upgrade kit (available separately) adds a full speed USB Type-C front port

SSD quick clips behind motherboard panel for fast installation

HDD mounts for two drives directly on motherboard panel

Optional SSD bracket kit (Type D, available separately) can replace up to two HDD positions

Multibracket position for an additional drive on the bottom panel (multibrackets sold separately)

Excellent cable management and build quality

Radiator support: Front - 360/280/240/140/120 mm (145 mm max width), Rear - 120 mm, Top - 240/120 mm (46 mm max MB component height)
Package Content: Focus 2 RGB case
Accessory bag
User manual
RGB controller
Label: Chasis Fractal Design Focus 2 RGB Black
